title: Pokemon GO - Kinda Funny Gamescast Ep. 77 (Pt. 2)
description:
Pokemon Go has taken over.

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

transcript_chunks.text: Kinda Funny is going to San Diego Comic-Con, we're doing a meet and greet at Petco Park. I'm hosting panels for DSX, Tomb Raider, Call of Duty, and more. And the best of all, Greg won't be there. Get all the details at KindaFunny.com/SDCC. Topic two: Pokémon Go again. Now here's the thing - last week we talked about it very briefly. Very little was in the topic of what are we playing now, and I was trying to play it, but there were server crashes and all that. So I had very little experience with it, and that was the day it came out. So it wasn't nearly the phenomenon that it is now. And last week, it has taken over the entire world, it seems like every social feed, every newscast - me and Greg were at Ramen, and we're seeing a freaking Pokémon on ESPN.
